author: JA Arroyo
comment: It used to let me hang up a call, doesn't do that anymore. It had also started saying "your trial has ended" even though I did pay for an upgrade.

reply.author: Евгений Суворов
reply.content: Due to the application design, for the in-app purchases to be recognized it's necessary to start mobile app if an update changes options section. End of call from watch is not working since all watch-phone communications are not processed if trial expires. Thus, entering mobile companion should resolve all of these problems.

title: Feature Request
